tool.name: Count.groups
tool.description: counts the number of sequences represented by a specific group or set of groups
tool.command: mothur_wrapper.py --cmd='count.groups' --result='^mothur.\S+\.logfile$:'$logfile,'^\S+\.groups.count$:'$grp_count,'^\S+\.summary$: '$summary --outputdir='$logfile.extra_files_path' #if isinstance($group.datatype, $__app__.datatypes_registry.get_datatype_by_extension('shared').__class__): --shared="$group" #elif isinstance($group.datatype, $__app__.datatypes_registry.get_datatype_by_extension('count_table').__class__): --count="$group" #else: --group="$group" #end if #if $groupnames.source == 'groups': #if $groupnames.groups.__str__ != "None" and len($groupnames.groups.__str__) > 0: --groups="$groupnames.groups" #end if #elif $groupnames.source == 'accnos': #if $groupnames.accnos.__str__ != "None" and len($groupnames.accnos.__str__) > 0: --accnos="$groupnames.accnos" #end if #end if

param.name: group
param.label: group, shared, or count_table - Group file for sequence count

param.name: source
param.label: Filter group names
param.option: A History Group Name Accnos Dataset

param.name: groups
param.label: groups - Pick groups to include
param.help: All groups displayed if none are selected.

param.name: accnos
param.label: accnos - Group Names from your history

tool.help:
@MOTHUR_OVERVIEW@
**Command Documenation**
The count.groups_ command counts sequences from a specific group or set of groups from a group_ or shared_ file.
.. _shared: http://www.mothur.org/wiki/Shared_file .. _group: http://www.mothur.org/wiki/Group_file .. _count.groups: http://www.mothur.org/wiki/Count.groups
